LanguageData.LikombinatTolerance.label: Likombinat tolerance
LanguageData.LikombinatTolerance.description: An experimental drug that can cause powerful side effects and dependence. Nevertheless, presumably allows you to bring the reaction to an incredible level. However, the effect cannot last for a long time, requiring constant recharge. If you stop taking the drug, dangerous side effects are possible.
LanguageData.LikombinatHediff.label: Unstoppable rage
